alert.note: Alert for Carquinez Strait and Delta; Central Sacramento Valley; Motherlode; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County; Southern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 02 at 2:00AM PST until March 02 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 24 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County, Sacramento Valley, Carquinez Strait and Delta, Northern San Joaquin Valley, Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County, Northeast Foothills/Sacramento Valley and Motherlode. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
